document.full_text: three-times all-star shortstop hanley ramirez landed on the florida marlins' disabled list for the first time in his career because of a lower back injury, the national league team said on monday.
document.title: marlins put shortstop ramirez on disabled list
lines_and_colors: three-times all-star shortstop hanley ramirez landed on the florida marlins' disabled list for the first time in his career because of a lower back injury, the national league team said on monday.
